main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects over Silver Grove, Kentucky from May 3 to May 15, 1961, characterized by bright lights moving rapidly and performing erratic maneuvers.
interesting points: One sighting involved round lights brighter than stars that traveled at speeds estimated around 2,000 mph., Another sighting reported a rounded silver object that changed colors while hovering., Multiple witnesses including law enforcement officers reported seeing these phenomena., The objects sometimes disappeared and reappeared, making it difficult to estimate distance., Observations included descriptions of fuzzy or blurred edges on the objects.
witness description: Local residents and law enforcement personnel reported the sightings.
